Reading List

A curated list of books that have influenced my thinking on various topics.

Productivity & Work

  • Deep Work by Cal Newport - See Deep-work
  • Atomic Habits by James Clear - Related to Productivity-systems
  • Getting Things Done by David Allen - Foundation of GTD
  • Essentialism by Greg McKeown

Learning & Memory

  • Make It Stick by Peter Brown - Evidence-based Learning-methods
  • A Mind for Numbers by Barbara Oakley
  • The Feynman Technique - See Feynman-technique

Knowledge Management

  • Building a Second Brain by Tiago Forte - See Knowledge-management
  • How to Take Smart Notes by Sönke Ahrens
  • The PARA Method by Tiago Forte

Technology & Digital Life

  • Digital Minimalism by Cal Newport - Related to Digital-minimalism
  • The Shallows by Nicholas Carr
  • Indistractable by Nir Eyal

Philosophy & Thinking

  • Thinking, Fast and Slow by Daniel Kahneman
  • Meditations by Marcus Aurelius
  • Letters from a Stoic by Seneca

Reading Strategies

  • Active-reading techniques
  • Speed-reading vs comprehension
  • Note-taking while reading

Current Reading

  • Currently exploring Zettelkasten methodology
  • Researching Spaced-repetition systems
  • Building a personal Knowledge-graph

This list evolves as I discover new books and revisit old favorites.
